main.default:
Discover the SERO app now!
Get started...

assessment.text: You learn to use a tool that helps you understand how you are doing in the moment.
assessment.title: My assessment

contacts.text: Here you call the contacts from your environment who are there for you.
contacts.title: Call my contacts

emergency.text: Here you call directly the emergency number 144.
emergency.title: Call emergency contact

midata.text:
Register or log in to save your data. This will allow you to use all the features of the SERO app.

Your data is stored securely on MIDATA's data platform and only you have access to it.
midata.title: Registration at MIDATA

securityplan.text: Create a personal safety plan so that it can be consulted at any time in the event of a crisis.
securityplan.title: My safety plan

alertLups.description: Costs: regular call rate up to the 10th minute, thereafter CHF 3.23/minute.
alertLups.title: LUPS advice line

securityplan.bubbleTitle: What do you like to do?
securityplan.defaultHint: Here you can access and edit your current safety plan and view previous ones.
securityplan.editHint:
You can rearrange the sections by dragging them to another place in the list.
If you click on the pencil, you can edit their content.
